mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltSortMchnInfoMapper.selectFcltSortMchnInfo */ FCLT.TRGT_YR AS TRGT_YR ,FCLT.APC_CD AS APC_CD ,FCLT.SN AS SN ,FCLT.SORT_MCHN_ITEM_CD AS SORT_MCHN_ITEM_CD ,FCLT.SORT_MCHN_HLD_YN AS SORT_MCHN_HLD_YN ,FCLT.SORT_MCHN_PRCS_SE_CD AS SORT_MCHN_PRCS_SE_CD ,FCLT.SORT_MCHN_PRCS_HR AS SORT_MCHN_PRCS_HR ,FCLT.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN ,FCLT.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT ,FCLT.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID ,FCLT.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID ,FCLT.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT ,FCLT.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID ,FCLT.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID
FROM TB_FCLT_SORT_MCHN_INFO FCLT WHERE 1=1 AND TRGT_YR = #{trgtYr} AND APC_CD = #{apcCd}
